data.text: @vdmuhovskis @krisjaniskarins Labdien! Vēlamies informēt, ka Covid krīzes dēļ esam bijuši spiesti atcelt reisus vairākiem simtiem tūkstošu pasažieru. Šī iemesla un lielās noslodzes dēļ naudas atmaksas termiņi ir daudz garāki, kā ierasts. Paldies par pacietību.

@Vitenav Labdien! Regulāros reisus daļā no maršrutiem plānojam atsākt ar 13.maiju (pie nosacījuma, ja to atļaus visi drošības apstākļi un valsts ārkārtas stāvoklis netiek pagarināts). Arī jaunais grafiks jau ir pielāgots šī brīža situācijai. Jaunākā informācija: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d
@EliseSmulovaVFX You may also contact us by e-mail reservations@airbaltic.lv, however please be informed that due to high workload it may take few weeks for an answer. Thank you.

@EliseSmulovaVFX Hello! If you indeed requested a bank transfer and received gift voucher, we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise:
https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

data.text: @annszi Good evening! We would like to inform that due to Covid crisis we have been forced to cancel flights for hundreds of thousands of passengers, therefore, due to high workload refund time may be much longer than usual and promised before - up to 90 days. We thank for your patience.

@Virniekiem @jzigajev Labrīt! Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt savu rezervācijas numuru, pārbaudīsim.
Kas attiecās uz lidojumiem jūnijā, varam ieteikt pārbaudīt precizāk konkrētos lidojumus - visticamāk tās ir citas frekvences (un ar citiem lidojuma laikiem), vai piedāvāti lidojumi ar savienojumu.

On April 23, the Supervisory Board of @airBaltic has approved the new business plan “Destination 2025 CLEAN”, which focuses on the impact of the Coronavirus crisis and adjustments that had to be made to the existing five-year strategy. Read more: https://t.co/Sq23vbWjX8 https://t.co/zaEQRVgOwB

We are continuing the special flights to bring home Baltic people who are still located abroad. For us, as the largest carrier in the Baltics, these flights mean a lot - they are performed with special care and caution following all the safety requirements. https://t.co/mFJB9QVMa9
@PatrickLodewyks Thanks for the support, Patrick! See you on board in the future!

@Trevski220 Hi! Please be informed that the "link" is sent only in the cases when passenger is using the online payment form in order to, add extra services to the reservation, for example.
Therefore all you need to do is wait at the moment for the refund to appear in your account. Thanks.
@ksensh_ We can inform that all our lines are available, however may be busy at some times. Regarding e-mails, due to high workload it may take few weeks for an answer. Thank you.

@ksensh_ Hello! If indeed you requested the money transfer and not the voucher we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise:
https://t.co/9W795LL6DQ

urls.title: Помощь и контакты | airBaltic
urls.description: Полезные ответы на вопросы и контакты, чтобы связаться с нами по поводу вашего рейса. Мы всегда готовы помочь вам!

data.text: @HenrietaVerho Labdien! Pārbaudījām abus pieteikumus un varam informēt, ka pirmajam lidojumam naudas atmaksas pieprasījums ir apstrādāts - naudiņu saņemsiet tuvāko mēnešu laikā, savukārt Jūsu dāvanu karšu pieprasījumi šobrīd vēl ir rindā uz apstrādi. Paldies par pacietību un sapratni.
@kSukevics Labdien, Krist. Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā Jūsu rezervācijas numuru? Paldies.

We have scheduled additional special flights from Oslo, Helsinki, Vienna, Frankfurt and Amsterdam to Riga and vice versa. It is possible to book tickets for these flights via special phone line: https://t.co/AUoVNWqC28 https://t.co/cYNeLHEfuo

airBaltic izpildīs papildu īpašos lidojumus no Oslo, Helsinkiem, kā arī no Vīnes, Frankfurtes un Amsterdamas uz Rīgu un atpakaļ. Rezervēt biļetes iespējams, zvanot uz īpašu tālruni: https://t.co/YJO0QLza33 https://t.co/LK8fbBsi1f
@thekjulika Hello, Kristine! Thank you for your warm message! We will pass it to our Reservations team as well.

@Mariepapillone Hello! Please contact our Reservations department in this case: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
Our colleagues will advise.

Thank you.

We have scheduled additional special flights from Vienna, Frankfurt and Amsterdam to Riga and vice versa. It is possible to book tickets for these flights via special phone line: https://t.co/AUoVNWqC28 https://t.co/ZalYiq9Q30

@carysoldall Thank you. In that case probably request is still in the queue for processing. You will receive the payment within the next months (due to high workload). Thanks for the patience and understanding.

@carysoldall Hello! Did you submitted us your new bank details in the form when requesting the refund? If not and your ticket was purchased on our webpage, then please contact our Reservations department:
https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

@TomJersey1234 Good morning! Please check your DMs.

data.text: @varvaspolvi @Gaussm Hello! If your tickets were purchased on our webpage and flights were cancelled from our side, please check the section "My Booking" for all the available options (including on how to request the money transfer). Thank you.

@Buckley88Katie Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take more time than usual. Once processed, payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.
@Briksne Hello! Thanks for your tweet. Please know we have replied - check your direct messages.

@KKokhno Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take more time than usual. Once processed, payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.

@severinzel Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take more time than usual. Once processed, payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.
@pauksh Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Lūdzam skatīt privātās vēstules.
@NevDawgCAFC Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please send us more details about your reservation (for example, your booking reference number) via DM, we’ll take a look.
@RozeIeva @anoreksijalv @Talis_L https://t.co/7sSlYaeXWn

@anoreksijalv @Talis_L Vēlamies informēt, ka Covid krīzes dēļ esam bijuši spiesti atcelt reisus vairākiem simtiem tūkstošu pasažieru. Šī iemesla dēļ naudas atmaksas termiņi ir daudz garāki, kā ierasts. Ja esiet veicis pieprasījumu naudas atmaksai, tas tiks apstrādāts un atmaksa veikta 90 dienu laikā.

airBaltic izpildīs papildu īpašos lidojumus no Oslo, Amsterdamas un Frankfurtes uz Rīgu un atpakaļ. Lidojumi uz un no Rīgas notiks 22. aprīlī, 29. aprīlī un 6. maijā. Rezervēt biļetes iespējams, zvanot uz īpašu tālruni: https://t.co/HekDhm5fGC https://t.co/u2ei7gbgWJ

We have scheduled additional special flights from Oslo, Amsterdam and Frankfurt to Riga and vice versa. Flights to and from Riga will be performed on April 22, April 29 and May 6. It is possible to book tickets for these flights via special phone line: https://t.co/xY2EkARtIQ https://t.co/7ow4SdoMEr
@UgisB Tik ilgi domājam, ka nē, jo pieprasījumi parasti tiek apstrādāti nedēļu, ne mēnešu laikā. Paldies par sapratni.
@UgisB Pieprasījuma apstrādes laiks var būt vairākas nedēļas. Precīzu laiku Jums sniegt šobrīd nevarēsim.
@UgisB No brīža, kad pieprasījums ir ticis apstrādāts.

data.text: @blogdroed Please DM us privately more details, we can check.

@blogdroed Unfortunately we won't be able to comment on their systems as well as what they are showing, however, if the airline has cancelled the flight, passenger is able to request full refund, gift voucher or other flight alternatives.
@blogdroed Hello! As your ticket has been purchased via Mytrip (travel agency), we kindly invite you to contact them for all the details as well as available options. Thank you.
@kaspars_z Lielās noslodzes dēļ (reisi ir atcelti simtiem tūkstošu pasažieru) naudas atmaksa var aizņemt līdz 90 dienām. Paldies par sapratni un pacietību.
@kaspars_z Naudas atmaksa tiks veikta uz to pašu bankas karti/saistīto kontu, kas tika izmantota biļetes iegādes brīdī.

@kaspars_z Labdien! Vēlamies informēt, ka maksājuma saite tiek sūtīta tikai gadījumos, kad pasažieris vēlas samaksāt par papildus pakalpojumiem, piemēram bagāžu, sēdvietu, u.c. (tam tiek izmantota tā pati forma). Tāpēc šajā gadījumā Jums nepieciešams vairs tikai gaidīt naudas atmaksu.
@AigarsSveicars Paldies par atbalstu! Uz tikšanos lidojumos jau nākotnē!

@alecrail91 Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take more time than usual. Once processed, payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.

@sentimentalscum We can confirm that all our lines are available, however may be busy at some times due to high workload. Therefore we kindly invite you to try later or from different phone/operator if you cannot connect. Thank you.

@sentimentalscum Hello! If that's the case and you are sure voucher was not requested, please contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise:
https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

data.text: @surelyx7 Hello! May we ask for the booking reference number privately in DM message? We will check the current status.
@MrGrantSmith That's correct!

@MrGrantSmith Hi! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know the reason for this is the fact that your request is still at queue waiting for processing. As we are receiving thousands of requests, unfortunately it takes more time than usual. Thank for your patience and understanding!
@nick_bolger Hello Nick! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know we have replied to your private message. Allow us to continue our conversation there. Thank you!
@justinramsden Correct. Once again, our apologies for a delay on this.

@justinramsden Hello Justin! Thank you for reaching out to us. Currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take more time than usual. Once processed, payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.

Easter greetings from our family to yours!🥚☀️
This year for the first time, airBaltic family is spending Easter together at home of airBaltic in Riga. Let’s cherish every moment with our loved ones and have a heart-warming holidays! https://t.co/rJ143rjpx2
@CoachDuckett Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details on your booking privately? Thank you!

@MarisKalnins Labdien, Māri! Naudas atmaksas process ir uzsākts - mūsu Rezervāciju departaments izskata katru pieteikumu rindas kārtībā. Tā kā saņemam nu jau desmitiem tūkstošu šādu pieprasījumu, to apstrāde aizņem ilgāku laiku, nekā ierasts. Atvainojamies par to!
